widget.description: Vader Desktop will launch an application that produces a breathing sound at the respiration rate provided. Please note that you will need the Vader Desktop Application installed on your computer. It can be found at http://0.0.0.0/sampleDevices/vaderDesktop/ You will also need the SAVOIR launch properties file found at http://0.0.0.0/sampleDevices/resources/ For instructions on installing these files please see the Vader Sample Device Guide found at http://0.0.0.0/savoirDocs/
